info.name: Pride Flags
info.summary: Allow users to theme different parts of their nextcloud with pride flags
info.description:
Allows every user to select their wanted pride flags as backgrounds for primary action buttons and folder icons in the files app.
Currently supported "targets": - primary action buttons - folder icons in the files app
Currently supported pride flags: - Original 6 color rainbow pride flag - Trans pride flag - Pansexual pride flag - Non-binary pride flag - Bisexual pride flag - Asexual pride flag - Lesbian pride flag
more flags to follow soon!
info.author: transcaffeine
